dataflow.temp_location: <Cloud Storage Location to store temporary files (eg: gs://<bucket_name>/<folder_name>>/)>
dataflow.project_id: <Optional: GCP PROJECT Override (Only pass if different from project_id defined above>
dataflow.location: <Optional: Location/Region Override (Only pass if different from location defined above>
dataflow.max_workers: <Optional: To cap the maximum number of workers>
dataflow.num_workers: <Optional: To start the job with initial number of workers>

gcs.output_folder: <Cloud Storage Location to store generated embeddings (eg: gs://<bucket_name>/<folder_name>/)>

spanner.project_id: <Optional: GCP PROJECT Override (Only pass if different from project_id defined above>

vertex.project_id: <Optional: GCP PROJECT Override (Only pass if different from project_id defined above>
vertex.location: <Optional: Location/Region Override (Only pass if different from location defined above>
